name: Settle Down
description:
YES THERE IS A BUG WHERE YOU CAN'T JUMP WHEN YOU REACH A POINT, SORRY FOR THAT. 

Made by playground studios

inspired by sam hogan with stick with it.

Music and whole dialog soon

Settle down is a short 2.5D version of stick with it. But it has some more background in it. We have a voice over, biomes and more.  This is in EARLY ACCESS so not everything is implanted.
